translation:
Friend Inácio

I have now obtained the attached order and with it I send the said man to our friend Abreu, and he should stop by here so I can write. When Inocêncio or the carts return, I will speak about the flours whatever occurs.

Your sincere friend and thank you Almeida  
Piratini, November 7, 1838.
